head.metaContent: Esta es el contenido del header, creo que sirve para el seo

hero.h1: Design and development of digital products
hero.description: We are a digital development and marketing agency located in Argentina. We are dedicated to helping businesses and entrepreneurs digitize their relationship with their customers.

section2.content: We focus on building a relationship with our clients. In this way we can better understand their needs and thus build better products.

section3.title: Modern problems require modern solutions
section3.subtitle: Technology has had an impact on companies in all sectors, without a doubt this is a phenomenon that is increasing. If your business isn't using technology, it's time to start doing it.

services.title: ecommerce
services.content: La tecnología ha tenido un impacto en las empresas de todos los sectores, sin lugar a dudas este es un fenomeno que va en aumento. Si su negocio no esta utilizando tecnologia, es hora de empezar a hacerlo.

services.title: websites
services.content: La tecnología ha tenido un impacto en las empresas de todos los sectores, sin lugar a dudas este es un fenomeno que va en aumento. Si su negocio no esta utilizando tecnologia, es hora de empezar a hacerlo.

section4.title: OUR SPECIALTY IS THE DEVELOPMENT OF ECOMMERCE
section4.content: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.

section5.title: Let's grow your sales with digital marketing

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.content: We develop a digital marketing and advertising campaign tailored to your business.

services.title: Social Ads
services.content: We create digital advertising campaigns, through graphic ads on instagram and facebook.

services.title: Google Ads
services.content: Ads that reach people the moment they are interested in the products and services you offer.

services.title: ANALITICA DIGITAL
services.content: With digital analytics tools we measure the results of our campaigns in order to measure our performance.
